text:
Kardashian-obsessed Jennifer Lawrence is starting to overstep her boundaries on Kim's clan — so much so it's sent the reality star into a "jealous rage," RadarOnline.com has learned exclusively!

The mother-of-two, 37, is said to be envious "as hell" over the hold Lawrence, 27, has on her infamous momager Kris Jenner.

“She’s waltzing into the family’s world acting like a superstar and upsetting the order with her loud chaos. Kris says she’s a hoot and treats her like the blonde daughter she never had."
title: Bitter Blood! Kim Kardashian In A 'Jealous Rage' Over Jennifer Lawrence

meta_data.description: Kim Kardashian is in a jealous rage over Jennifer Lawrence and the hold the actress has on her momager Kris Jenner, a source claims.
